data.lyric:
[ti:A  Holly  Jolly  Christmas]
[ar:Burl  Ives]
[al:Christmas  Eve]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Holly Jolly Christmas (Single Version) - Burl Ives (伯尔·艾夫斯)
[00:07.01]Written by：Johnny Marks
[00:14.03]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:17.16]It's the best time of the year
[00:21.02]I don't know if there'll be snow
[00:24.40]But have a cup of cheer
[00:27.70]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:30.84]And when you walk down the street
[00:34.77]Say hello to friends you know
[00:38.14]And everyone you meet
[00:41.64]Oh  ho  the mistletoe
[00:45.19]Hung where you can see
[00:48.37]Somebody waits for you
[00:51.81]Kiss her once for me
[00:54.98]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:58.42]And in case you didn't hear
[01:02.35]Oh  by golly
[01:03.78]Have a holly jolly Christmas this year
[01:09.09]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:12.26]It's the best time of the year
[01:14.44]
[01:22.65]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:25.76]And when you walk down the street
[01:29.08]Say hello to friends you know
[01:32.88]And everyone you meet
[01:35.75]Oh  ho  the mistletoe
[01:39.80]Hung where you can see
[01:43.18]Somebody waits for you
[01:46.48]Kiss her once for me
[01:49.54]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:52.91]And in case you didn't hear
[01:56.28]Oh  by golly
[01:58.16]Have a holly jolly Christmas this year
